title: Remote Science Teaching Method Design Workshop Based on Educational Technology Trends (Large-Scale)

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific knowledge, fundamental digital literacy
context.additional_context: Adult education environment for current practitioners, smartphone-based learning

learning_goals: Learners analyze the five core trends of TEL (Technology-Enhanced Learning)—such as personalization and social learning—and apply them to science education
Learners develop mobile-optimized remote science education modules using learning design tools
Learners design educational effectiveness metrics by applying data-driven educational improvement methodologies

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
